Package space.sunqian.common.net.http

Interface HttpReq.Body

Enclosing interface:
HttpReq
public static interface HttpReq.Body
Represents the body of the request.

    Type of request body.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    byte @Nonnull []
    toByteArray()
    Returns a byte array represents the data of the body.
    @Nonnull ByteBuffer
    toByteBuffer()
    Returns a byte buffer represents the data of the body.
    @Nonnull InputStream
    toInputStream()
    Returns an InputStream to read the data of the body.
    @Nonnull String
    toText()
    Returns a string represents the data of the body using CharsKit.defaultCharset().
    @Nonnull HttpReq.Body.Type
    type()
    Returns the type of the body.

  • Method Details

    • type

      @Nonnull @Nonnull HttpReq.Body.Type type()
      Returns the type of the body.
      Returns:
      the type of the body

    • toInputStream

      @Nonnull @Nonnull InputStream toInputStream()
      Returns an InputStream to read the data of the body. If the data is originally of input stream type, return the data itself.
      Returns:
      an InputStream to read the data of the body

    • toByteArray

      byte @Nonnull [] toByteArray()
      Returns a byte array represents the data of the body. If the data is originally of byte array type, return the data itself.
      Returns:
      a byte array represents the data of the body

    • toByteBuffer

      @Nonnull @Nonnull ByteBuffer toByteBuffer()
      Returns a byte buffer represents the data of the body. If the data is originally of byte buffer type, return the data itself.
      Returns:
      a byte buffer represents the data of the body

    • toText

      @Nonnull @Nonnull String toText()
      Returns a string represents the data of the body using CharsKit.defaultCharset(). If the data is originally of string type, return the data itself.
      Returns:
      a string represents the data of the body using CharsKit.defaultCharset()
